website_summaries.verdict: It won't be a good fit for larger children due to its design and size, but if it fits your child, you will be pleased with its portability and low-end price.
pros: pops open and folds easily to fit into the carrying bag that comes with it
cons: Tends to be wobbly when heavier or active children are in it

customer_reviews.title: Wasn’t what I hoped for it to be
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my special needs daughter that can’t sit well just yet in a regular high chair. This one was one of the very few I could find with the harness belt. I loved the harness belt but when she leaned forward the whole back just came forward with her so it wasn’t much help beside keeping her upright. The tray was so high it was about at her shoulders so wasn’t very practical for her to be able to self feed her snacks. I love the idea of this but I am actually returning my item and trying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this chair!
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat!! Bought this seat because I was looking for a high chair to take camping with us! I use it for so much more! Pros: comes with a travel bag which I love that I can carry on my shoulder and hold my baby with ease, very easy to set up, comfortable-my son enjoys sitting in it and it comes with a tray that has its own pocket in the bag, and folds up nicely in bag and doesn’t take up room when storing in car!
customer_reviews.author: AB

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for a very safe and  mobile highchair.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I like this chair. It fits everywhere. Folds up nicely, easy to clean, very durable. Oops! forgot to send in Product Registration.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Carrillo

customer_reviews.title: Great travel option for high chair
customer_reviews.text: This was a great find. It will work even better once my little man gets a bit larger, but still worked for a 1 year old, comfortable and functional tray which was hard to find.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Zamir G. Flynn

customer_reviews.title: its light weight and great for travel
customer_reviews.text: my son is comfy in it, its light weight and great for travel. very easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: Great Vacuum

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold & travel with.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold and travel with. Super difficult to topple. Sturdy. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Chair and compact!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this high chair for my 1 year old so we could use it for camping. It was better than I expected. The tray is awesome because it is not part of the chair and its easy to clean and put away. Very compact for a high chair. When it's all put away it looks just like a regular camp chair in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to clean and works awesome
customer_reviews.text: We were looking for an easy, portable high chair for my 9 month old son for when we are visiting family. This high chair did not disappoint! it folds up and has a carrying case like a portable chair, it's light, it's easy to setup, easy to clean and sturdy! my son is 22 pounds and had no issues sitting in this chair during dinner and we were not worried about it tipping over, it has an extra lock on each side to ensure no accidents happen. Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Williams

customer_reviews.title: Best baby purchase ever!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This chair is so amazing. Best baby purchase ever. Its easy to set up. Its easy to collapse and stores in the smallest places. I am considering purchasing a second one.
customer_reviews.author: patrick riley

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used it yet but seems to be a good high chair
customer_reviews.author: Rial Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Seems safe and long lasting
customer_reviews.text: The tray could be a better set up but sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Tara Boss

customer_reviews.title: Happy with chair
customer_reviews.text: I don't like that my daughter sinks into the chair other then that I loved it.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: It's very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it is to take everywhere. I bought it so I could have it at work and home.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this chair it was my favorite! I took it places so my daughter didn’t have to use a restaurant chair! Then after having it for 4 months the tray broke and now the seems are coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Gipson

product_meta.title: One2Stay Portable Travel High Chair with an Adjustable Backrest (6-36 Months) - Comfortable Foldable Baby Feeding Chair - 5-Point Safety Harness and Double Locking System - Easy to Clean Red
feature_bullets: Go-Anywhere Portability: Weighing just 5.5lbs (2.5kg), our infant high chairs were made with travel in mind! They effortlessly fold and unfold in seconds, offering a day out with your baby that’s no-hassle. For added convenience, a carrying bag is included.

In Safe Hands: Designed to meet the strictest safety standards, our high chairs accommodate ages 6-36 months or up to 50lbs! The 5-point safety harness keeps your child securely in place, while our double locking system prevents unintended collapse.

Comfort Meets Convenience: With a footrest, even the fussiest baby will love our folding high chair! Special design features include a removable BPA-Free tray and seat, as well as storage baskets that are ideal for toys and diapers.

Trusted By Parents: Designed in the Netherlands, our one-of-a-kind baby eating chairs are patented, ensuring you won’t find them anywhere else! Premium materials like the hard plastic tray and waterproof seat make it both safe and easy to hand wash.

Shop Risk Free: At One2Stay, we know that all baby products have to be approved by your little one! That’s why we offer a 30-day guarantee on all purchases. If you’re not satisfied with your modern high chair, just return the order for a full refund.
